tool_description: Cleans and preprocesses review text by removing noise, normalizing formatting, and handling special characters for downstream analysis.

review_texts.description: Array of raw review text content

remove_html.description: Whether to remove HTML tags and entities

normalize_whitespace.description: Whether to normalize whitespace and line breaks

remove_special_chars.description: Whether to remove special characters except punctuation

convert_case.description: Case conversion: none, lower, upper, title

error_messages: Invalid review_texts: Input must be a non-empty array of strings. Check that review content was properly parsed.
Invalid convert_case value: Use one of [none, lower, upper, title]. Case conversion helps normalize text for analysis.
Min length out of range: min_length must be between 1 and 1000 characters. Very short texts may not be meaningful for analysis.
Processing limit exceeded: Maximum 3000 texts can be processed at once. Split large datasets into smaller batches.
Empty result after preprocessing: All texts were filtered out. Check min_length setting and input text quality.
usage: Provide review_texts array and configure preprocessing options. The tool will clean and normalize the text according to specified parameters.

processed_texts.description: Array of cleaned and preprocessed review texts

filtered_count.description: Number of texts filtered out due to length or quality
